attributes.action: Make sanitary products free for women under 21 years old.
attributes.additional_details:
Girls should be free to be educated without having to worry about something as basic but essential as tampons or sanitary towels.

http://www.elleuk.com/life-and-culture/news/a34625/just-when-you-thought-the-tampon-row-couldnt-get-any-older/

Miss Represented are a group of four women from the North East. We are on a mission to empower, encourage and seek equality for all. 
https://mmj.tees.ac.uk/~project38/
attributes.background: In 2017 it has been reported that girls in the UK are missing time at school because they can't afford sanitary products during their periods. This is completely unacceptable.

rejection.details: We can only accept petitions from named individuals, not organisations.
